metadata.title: CVE-2022-45748 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered with assimp 5.1.4, a use after free occurred infunction ColladaParser::ExtractDataObjectFromChannel in file/code/AssetLib/Collada/ColladaParser.cpp.

criterions.comment: assimp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
